format: A data frame with 71 observations on the following 8 variables.

parameters.fte: Full-time enrollment status: full-time 1 or part-time 0.5.
parameters.years: Number of years employed by the school district.
parameters.fica: Amount paid into Social Security and Medicare per year through the Federal Insurance Contribution Act (FICA), in dollars.
parameters.total: Total annual salary of the teacher, resulting from the sum of base salary + fica + retirement, in dollars.
parameters.id: Identification code for each teacher, assigned randomly.
parameters.retirement: Amount paid into the retirement fund of the teacher per year, in dollars.
parameters.degree: Highest educational degree attained: BA (bachelor's degree) or MA (master's degree).

description:
Description
This dataset contains teacher salaries from 2009-2010 for 71 teachers
employed by the St. Louis Public School in Michigan, as well as several
covariates.
title: Teacher Salaries in St. Louis, Michigan
reference: Originally posted on SODA Developers (dev.socrata.com/data), removed in 2020.
